mapper.update:
update lease
station_info_id = #{stationInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
conference_room_info_id = #{conferenceRoomInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
site_id = #{siteId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update lease set station_info_id = #{stationInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, conference_room_info_id = #{conferenceRoomInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, site_id = #{siteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT id ,area, capacity, location ,phone_number ,price ,book_type , description from site WHERE is_enable = 1 UNION SELECT id , area, capacity, location ,phone_number ,price ,book_type , description from conference_room_info WHERE is_enable = 1
order by ${parameter.orders}

SELECT id ,area, capacity, location ,phone_number ,price ,book_type , description from site WHERE is_enable = 1 UNION SELECT id , area, capacity, location ,phone_number ,price ,book_type , description from conference_room_info WHERE is_enable = 1

SELECT id ,area, capacity, location ,phone_number ,price ,book_type , description from site WHERE is_enable = 1 and is_lease = 1 UNION SELECT id , area, capacity, location ,phone_number ,price ,book_type , description from conference_room_info WHERE is_enable = 1 and is_lease = 1

SELECT id ,area, capacity, location ,phone_number ,price ,book_type , description from site WHERE is_enable = 1 and is_lease = 2 UNION SELECT id , area, capacity, location ,phone_number ,price ,book_type , description from conference_room_info WHERE is_enable = 1 and is_lease = 2
